channel.title: ~~~DesolationScape v1!~~~ *NEW CLAN WARS! [317]*
channel.description:
... well ... i'll get pictures up here ASAP ... but for now im gonna explain wut this source is... If you have ever heard of Bl00d Bl1tz you MIGHT find this similar... but it's NOT leeched! ... it uses a mixture of st00f added into one folder and compiled ... then re-coded and added special shit on it!
Feature #1: Clan Wars! (NOT castle wars!!!) FOR 317 DEOB's!!!! - U have people who supervise them... i'll make a portal later ... but for now u have to go into the clan war lobby when ur clan leader tells u to... when u are in u will be teleported into another area where u will walk out into the warring area! - * Currently: 1 Map is Complete * ( you do NOT lose your items in this area...) so have fun Pking!
Feature #2: Upcoming Party House.. :eek: :eek: well ... i'm currently working on making a party room that will be in Falador like the current one is... once i move it to that area, i will add party pete and make him walk around and st00f... then i will make dancing knights and tables for them to stand on! ... then i'm gonna make a lever that when you put in 200 Million GP it'll drop Christmass crackers like balloons! ... :D :D :D :D :D (use on a friend to see who gets the reward!)
Feature #3: New Home... idk what im gonna do for this yet :( if u have any ideas... then post them below and tell me what u think i should do with for ::home ...
Feature #4: ATTEMPTING! to make Clan Chat... It works like this... u do ::ccmake [clan name] and your clan is up :D... to join you do ::ccjoin [clan name] or ::ccrename [new clan name] and etc. ...
Feature #5: Random Portals?!? ... all you do is walk around ... like if you go to ::queststart and walk around... you might find a magical portal just laying in the middle of a field? ... well click on it and u'll be teleported to a minigame! ... (if you win minigame you will be rewarded with SOMETHING)
PIX'S COMING SOON! ONCE I WAKE UP TOMOZ AND GO TO SCHOOL AND ST00f LIKE DAT! ... then i'll post pixs I'll add tonz more ... but it'll be released around ........ June? or so ... end of june after i get back from camp ... or somethin :P ... or if i feel like releasing it when i feel like it...
MADE FROM SCRATCH!
~~~ FIRST RELEASE!!! ~~~ Don't be too harsh dudez!
BTW if u feel like listening to Peanut Butta Jelly Time ... *the one that took 50 MegaKilos of Crack* then download the attachment below! its best song i've heard. ... when i add an Mp3 player to my clients that's #1 song on there :D
DOWNLOAD ME!!! --------> http://rapidshare.com/files/233483984/Penut_Butter_Jelly_Time.mp3

item.title: ~~~DesolationScape v1!~~~ *NEW CLAN WARS! [317]*
item.dc:creator: @Volencia Volencia
item.description:
@Volencia wrote:

[quote=“lildude783, post:6, topic:278549”]well … i soz … but i gotta get a moderator to close this up or delete it or something… DesolationScape has decided to go 377 instead of 317 and we dont want this source no more… so instead of releasing it we is deleting it … cuz it’s no good… (got too NPC filled and the hoster was lazy as hell… and wouldnt take the time out to compile and rehost it so we all hate it now :P… I wuz gonna post pixs… but i’ll post the 377 … so be ready for that one l8r =D

DBmini, Jurrasic Park Mini, Holiday Item Mini, Icon Mini are customly made in the 377 and will be made in less than 1 month =D … get ready for it cuz DesolationScape 377 is coming soon

MoparScape Mod… PLZ DELETE THIS TOPIC![/quote]looks like shit anyways

Read full topic

item.title: ~~~DesolationScape v1!~~~ *NEW CLAN WARS! [317]*
item.dc:creator: @48_Jumps 48 Jumps
item.description:
@48_Jumps wrote:

Feature #4: ATTEMPTING! to make Clan Chat... It works like this... u do ::ccmake [clan name] and your clan is up Big Grin... to join you do ::ccjoin [clan name] or ::ccrename [new clan name] and etc. ...

Find the command ccjoin and look at the junk underneath it. Take that and find your action-button ID of the join clan-chat button. If your planning a project you should be able to figure out the rest.

Read full topic
